div.p: This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/contract-data-meaning defines the following codes:

tr.td: The consent applies directly to the instance of the resource.
The consent applies directly to the instance of the resource and instances it refers to.
The consent applies directly to the instance of the resource and instances that refer to it.
The consent applies to instances of resources that are authored by.

description.value: How a resource reference is interpreted when evaluating contract offers.

definition.value: The consent applies directly to the instance of the resource.
The consent applies directly to the instance of the resource and instances it refers to.
The consent applies directly to the instance of the resource and instances that refer to it.
The consent applies to instances of resources that are authored by.
